--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 3/18/03 9:01:02 PM Central Standard Time, 
> aerosmith4e@a... writes:
> 
> 
> > Carnatron stopped. He stood on a tall mountain. He could see the 
tripred and 
> > 
> > pred base from here. He sent out a telephathical message to any 
decepticons 
> > on 
> > the planet. "If there are any decepticons contact me."
> > 
> 
> Stopping in her tracks, as the humanoids showed her & Empath their 
land & 
> city, which was like something from a vision or dream. It took only 
a moment, 
> but she understood the call... it was a faint whisper to her. Maybe 
more than 
> a whisper to Empath...
> 
> Glancing back at Empath, she wondered what she made of it. A 
Decepticon 
> rally? 
> 
> "Empath? How far can you relay on your comm system?"

"Far enough."  Empath mentally traces the call, then scans the 
planet.  She guesses the reason for the rally when she finds one 
particular mind.  "Optimus Prime is here."
